bibl.title: Iudicia perierunt (Cicero, de haruspicum responsis 28. 60).
bibl.note: Summary of a talk delivered at the annual meeting of The Amer. Soc. of Pap., December 29, 1965, at Providence, Rhode Island; the full presentation of the topic is published in: Studi in onore di Edoardo Volterra. Vol. I (Milano, 1971) pp. 469-502.
Schiller A. Arthur, Iudicia perierunt (Cicero, de haruspicum responsis 28. 60).
